#include<iostream>
#include<algorithm>
#include<vector>
#include<string>
#include<queue>
#include<math.h>
#include<functional>
#include<stdio.h>
using namespace std;
long long dp[1005][1005];
const int bignumber = 1000000007;
int main(){
	dp[0][0] = 1;
	for(int i =1;i <= 1000;i++){
		for(int j = 1;j <= 1000;j++){
			if(j>i) dp[i][j] == 0;
			else{
				dp[i][j]=((long long)dp[i-1][j]*(i-1) + dp[i-1][j-1])%bignumber;
			}
		}
	}
	int t;
	cin >> t;
	for(int l = 0;l < t;l++){
		int n,k;
		cin >> n >> k;
		cout << dp[n][k] << endl;
	}
}
